About the Company: Redington (India) Ltd started its business along with its subsidiaries, it is in the business of end-to-end supply chain management of IT and Non-IT products in various potential geographies of South Asia, Middle East Turkey and Africa. Recently, the company has started distribution of mobile handsets and accessories in Nigeria and in limited territories of India. Apart from distribution, we also provide support services for IT hardware and mobile phones.
